mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.status = '0' and del_flag = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_user_role ur left join sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.status = '0' and del_flag = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m where m.parent_id = #{parentId} and m.status = '0' and del_flag = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

SELECT DISTINCT m.perms FROM `sys_user_role` ur LEFT JOIN `sys_role_menu` rm ON ur.`role_id` = rm.`role_id` LEFT JOIN `sys_menu` m ON m.`id` = rm.`menu_id` WHERE ur.`user_id` = #{userId} AND m.`menu_type` IN ('C','F') AND m.`status` = 0 AND m.`del_flag` = 0
